com.reimaginebanking.api.nessieandroidsdk.requestclients

Class PurchaseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reimaginebanking.api.nessieandroidsdk.requestclients.PurchaseClient

  • public class PurchaseClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A Client singleton object that provides methods for all Purchase endpoints.
